snippet: The most intriguing player on the Brazilian men’s soccer team is surely the square-jawed giant named for a comic-book character.
abstract: Profile of Brazilian soccer player Givanildo Vieira de Souza, known as Hulk, who is one of Brazil's three over-age players in the under-23 Olympic men's tournament; Brazil defeats Honduras, 3-2, to advance to the semifinals at the London Games.
lead_paragraph: The most intriguing player on the Brazilian men’s soccer team is surely the square-jawed giant named for a comic-book character.

headline.seo: Hulk Looks to Spark Brazil in Olympic Soccer
headline.main: Not Quite Incredible (Yet), Hulk Hopes to Spark Brazil
headline.print_headline: Not Quite Incredible (Yet), Hulk Hopes to Spark Brazil
